title: "Photos" search/menu bar displays spurious suggestions which are unnecessary and distracting
content:
In Photos, there is a search/menu bar at the top of the screen that is persistent.  In the bar there is always some search suggestion which has nothing to do with anything.  Today it says: Search "safari", of all things!  I find these suggestions distracting. Just the word "search" or the magnifying glass icon would be adequate.
I have not been able to find a way to turn off the suggestions.  Any help would be appreciated.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
